ing: 1 package McCormickÂ® Original Country Gravy Mix
1 1/2 cups shredded sharp Vermont Cheddar cheese, such as CabotÂ®, divided
des: "This is everything you love about Vermont Â– cheese, apples and of course, maple syrup Â– all blended into one delicious dip. Creamy and Cheddar-cheesy, McCormickÂ® Original Country Gravy Mix adds a crave-worthy flavor that can't be beat. Grab a plate of French toast sticks, mini waffles or crackers and dig in!"
ins:
Preheat oven to 350 degrees F. Mix cream cheese, mayonnaise, milk, bacon, Gravy Mix and 1 cup of the cheese in large bowl until well blended.
Spread in 9-inch glass pie plate sprayed with no stick cooking spray. Top with apple and remaining 1/2 cup cheese.
Bake 25 minutes or until heated through and cheese is melted. Drizzle with syrup.
